pages.text: One of the main mods that we use is $(5)Create$(). It is a breathtaking mod but one thing that it lacks is in game guides. This is however overruled by its use of the mechanic called $(l)Pondering$().
Hold 'W' while hovering over almost any functional block in $(5)Create$() and it will bring up a visual tutorial on how that block functions and what it can be used for.
